name: Stone Admirer 3
description:
Stone Admirer 3 is the third entry in the beloved Stone Admirer series. Stone Admirer 3 is an ambient stone admiration and meditation simulation featuring 3D graphics and solitude. 

Be alone with your thoughts. Haunt the big quiet cliff. Admire stones! 

How to play:

Enter the Circle of Admiration and stare intently at any stone of your choice. The stones can no longer fight back. Let the wind massage your brain. 

Feel alive

Controls:

WASD to move.

Use your mouse to look.

Press Shift to move faster.

Press Escape to quit.

Headphones recommended
